short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discuss Anywhere. Post your comment anywhere. Bypass censorships!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want to post a comment on a website or webpage, but they don't allow it?

You can now bypass site censorship with Habitus!

1. Just visit the website or webpage
2. Click the Habitus icon
3. Post your comment for everyone to see!

Is Youtube comment disabled? Is WordPress comment disabled? Do site admins suppress your opinion? News site doesn't have a comment section? Use Habitus.
